flask.name: Flask [+100 HP]
flask.description: A flask used to increment your health from one point to another. How much does it increment it by? Well it says in the name there silly!

cure.name: Antidote
cure.description: Are you poisoned? Have you been involved in a fight with a poisonous snake? Well this is the cure for you!

manaflask.name: Mana Flask [+35 MP]
manaflask.description: A refreshing drink for those a little bit low on mana!

burger.name: Burger [+200 HP]
burger.description: How did a burger make its way into a fantasy world? Who knows, but it's delicious!

bigflask.name: Big Flask [+250 HP]
bigflask.description: It's like the other flask, except it's bigger, so obviously it must heal more!

firepotion.name: Fire Potion
firepotion.description: Feeling a little hot? Have you been burnt to a crisp and can't seem to shake off that burning sensation? The fire potion is the answer to your ailments!

cd.name: CD [Quest]
cd.description: A CD received by some dying soldier. Contains his last mixtape. I should probably get this to his wife or something.

snowpotion.name: Snow Potion
snowpotion.description: A magical potion received by some weird monument. It temporarily prevents the player from taking damage from the cold.

blackpotion.name: Black Potion
blackpotion.description: This potion is not at all suspicious. Drink up, it's really yummy!

gold.name: Gold
gold.description: A very useful shiny metal that for some reason people like to exchange for goods.

banana.name: Banana
banana.description: A banana, a fruit that is yellow and long. It is a good source of potassium and fiber.

watermelon.name: Watermelon
watermelon.description: A watermelon, I should probably cut this up before eating it.

apple.name: Apple
apple.description: An apple, an excellent source of energy!

orange.name: Orange
orange.description: It's funny, the name of the fruit is the same as the colour and its colour.

shardt1.name: Shard - Tier 1
shardt1.description: Shards are items used to enchant equipments. Each tier represents the maximum attainable enchantment level and chance of enchanting succeeding.

shardt2.name: Shard - Tier 2
shardt2.description: Shards are items used to enchant equipments. Each tier represents the maximum attainable enchantment level and chance of enchanting succeeding.

shardt3.name: Shard - Tier 3
shardt3.description: Shards are items used to enchant equipments. Each tier represents the maximum attainable enchantment level and chance of enchanting succeeding.

shardt4.name: Shard - Tier 4
shardt4.description: Shards are items used to enchant equipments. Each tier represents the maximum attainable enchantment level and chance of enchanting succeeding.

shardt5.name: Shard - Tier 5
shardt5.description: Shards are items used to enchant equipments. Each tier represents the maximum attainable enchantment level and chance of enchanting succeeding.

logs.name: Logs
logs.description: Ah yes, the classic logs. Looking at them I can see that they're made out of wood.

palmlogs.name: Palm Logs
palmlogs.description: Funny enough, these logs are made out of palm wood. Which is not the same as the other kinds of wood.

icelogs.name: Ice Logs
icelogs.description: These logs are made out of ice. They're very cold to the touch. No matter what, they will not thaw. I wonder what happens when you put it in fire.

icepalmlogs.name: Ice Palm Logs
icepalmlogs.description: These logs are made out of ice and palm wood. They're very cold to the touch.

bloodwoodlogs.name: Bloodwood Logs
bloodwoodlogs.description: It almost looks like they're bleeding.

bead.name: Magic Bead
bead.description: A bead that emanates magical properties. Can be used in conjunction with other items to create magical items.

lightningbead.name: Lightning Bead
lightningbead.description: A magical bead imbued with lightning properties. Can be used to craft magical items.

naturebead.name: Magic Bead
naturebead.description: A magical bead imbued with the power of nature. Can be used to craft magical items.

firebead.name: Magic Bead
firebead.description: A magical bead imbued with fire. Can be used to craft magical items.

icebead.name: Magic Bead
icebead.description: A strong magical bead perpetually frozen. Can be used to craft magical items.

stick.name: Stick
stick.description: A stick. It's a stick. What else do you want me to say about it?
